languages.text: "Откровение. За ним сомнение. За ним спор. За ним Суждение... нет, отсутствие Суждения". {n}Голос Авеля становится сбивчивым.{/n} "Противоречие. Дилемма, породившая антагонизм..."

"An epiphany. Followed by doubt. Followed by debate. Followed by Judgement— no, a lack of Judgement." {n}Abel's speech becomes fragmentary.{/n} "A contradiction. A dilemma, resulting in antagonism..."
languages.original_text: "Откровение. За ним сомнение. За ним спор. За ним Суждение... нет, отсутствие Суждения". {n}Голос Авеля становится сбивчивым.{/n} "Противоречие. Дилемма, породившая антагонизм..."

traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: 「ひらめきだ。疑念が起こる。議論を重ねる。ジャッジメントに…いや、ジャッジメントは不在だ」{n}アベルの話が断片的になっていく。{/n}「矛盾。確執を生むジレンマ…」
languages.original_text: "An epiphany. Followed by doubt. Followed by debate. Followed by Judgement— no, a lack of Judgement." {n}Abel's speech becomes fragmentary.{/n} "A contradiction. A dilemma, resulting in antagonism..."

traits.locale_text: 「ひらめきだ。疑念が起こる。議論を重ねる。ジャッジメントに…いや、ジャッジメントは不在だ」{n}アベルの話が断片的になっていく。{/n}「矛盾。確執を生むジレンマ…」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: “最初是一场顿悟，然后是怀疑、争执、审判——不对，没有审判。”{n}亚伯的话语变得断断续续。{/n}“是矛盾，是困境，最终引发了分裂……”
languages.original_text: "An epiphany. Followed by doubt. Followed by debate. Followed by Judgement— no, a lack of Judgement." {n}Abel's speech becomes fragmentary.{/n} "A contradiction. A dilemma, resulting in antagonism..."

traits.locale_text: “最初是一场顿悟，然后是怀疑、争执、审判——不对，没有审判。”{n}亚伯的话语变得断断续续。{/n}“是矛盾，是困境，最终引发了分裂……”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: « Une révélation. Suivie de doutes. Suivis d'un débat. Suivi d'un jugement. Non, d'une absence de jugement. » {n}Abel parle de manière de plus en plus fragmentée.{/n} « Une contradiction. Un dilemme, provoquant un antagonisme... »
languages.original_text: "An epiphany. Followed by doubt. Followed by debate. Followed by Judgement— no, a lack of Judgement." {n}Abel's speech becomes fragmentary.{/n} "A contradiction. A dilemma, resulting in antagonism..."

traits.locale_text: « Une révélation. Suivie de doutes. Suivis d'un débat. Suivi d'un jugement. Non, d'une absence de jugement. » {n}Abel parle de manière de plus en plus fragmentée.{/n} « Une contradiction. Un dilemme, provoquant un antagonisme... »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: «Una epifanía, seguida de duda, seguida de debate, seguida de juicio. No, una falta de juicio». {n}El discurso de Abel se vuelve incoherente.{/n} «Una contradicción. Un dilema que dio lugar al antagonismo...».
languages.original_text: "An epiphany. Followed by doubt. Followed by debate. Followed by Judgement— no, a lack of Judgement." {n}Abel's speech becomes fragmentary.{/n} "A contradiction. A dilemma, resulting in antagonism..."

traits.locale_text: «Una epifanía, seguida de duda, seguida de debate, seguida de juicio. No, una falta de juicio». {n}El discurso de Abel se vuelve incoherente.{/n} «Una contradicción. Un dilema que dio lugar al antagonismo...».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: "Eine Erleuchtung. Gefolgt von Zweifel. Gefolgt von einer Debatte. Gefolgt von einem Urteil — nein, dem Ausbleiben eines Urteils." {n}Abels Sätze verkommen zu Fragmenten.{/n} "Ein Widerspruch. Ein Dilemma, das zu Antagonismus führt ..."
languages.original_text: "An epiphany. Followed by doubt. Followed by debate. Followed by Judgement— no, a lack of Judgement." {n}Abel's speech becomes fragmentary.{/n} "A contradiction. A dilemma, resulting in antagonism..."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Erleuchtung. Gefolgt von Zweifel. Gefolgt von einer Debatte. Gefolgt von einem Urteil — nein, dem Ausbleiben eines Urteils." {n}Abels Sätze verkommen zu Fragmenten.{/n} "Ein Widerspruch. Ein Dilemma, das zu Antagonismus führt ..."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: "Aydınlanma. Ardından şüphe. Ardından tartışma. Ardından da Hüküm. Daha doğrusu Hüküm yoksunluğu." {n}Abel'in ağzından sözcükler parça parça çıkıyor.{/n} "Çelişki. Husumetle sonuçlanmış bir çıkmaz."
languages.original_text: "An epiphany. Followed by doubt. Followed by debate. Followed by Judgement— no, a lack of Judgement." {n}Abel's speech becomes fragmentary.{/n} "A contradiction. A dilemma, resulting in antagonism..."

traits.locale_text: "Bir aydınlanma. Onu şüphe takip etmiş. Onu tartışma takip etmiş. Onu Hüküm takip etmiş. Hayır, Hüküm yoksunluğu daha doğrusu." {n}Abel'in konuşması parça parça bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Bir çelişki. Bir çıkmaz. Husumetle sonuçlanan."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
